The claim was published on a pro: government Facebook group on August 21, 2020, and has been shared more than 1,300 times.
The Thai: language text overlay on the image translates to English as: "Announcement !!! Students are banned from raising the three-fingered salute; those who are dissatisfied can leave."
Mater Dei School: a private, all-girls Catholic school in central Bangkok, Thailand, was mentioned in the claim.
The school released a statement in Thai: 2020, denying the claim and stating that all messages circulating on social media regarding the ban were not released by the school.
